data-testid="nav-item-Games" data-navid="Games"><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/crosswords" class="css-u90q6n" data-navid="Games">Games</a><button type="button" aria-label="open Games submenu" aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Games submenu" class="css-1qalmak" data-testid="nav-dropdown-Games"><div class="css-13qj3r5"><div class="css-167b3qw"></div><div class="css-132p2yg"><div id="Games-brand-column" class="css-7s6arl"><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/crosswords"><h3>Games</h3><p>Word games, logic puzzles and crosswords, including an extensive aria-labelledby="The Athletic-links-icons-column-header"><li><a class="css-ed0o7b" href="https://www.nytimes.com/athletic/connections-sports-edition" style="white-space:pre-wrap"><i Sports Edition</span> </p></a></li><li><a class="css-ed0o7b" href="https://www.nytimes.com/athletic/tag/connections-sports-edition-coach/" style="white-space:pre-wrap"><i class="css-1n92pmf"></i><p><span>Connections Coach</span> </p></a></li></ul></div></div></div><div class="css-1qt2b4r">The Athletic<!-- --> is included in an All Access subscription.<!-- --> <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/subscription/all-access">Learn more.</a></div></div></li></ul></nav></div></header></div></div><div><main id="site-content"><div class="css-10bkgh4 eu3y8st0"><div class="smartphone tablet desktop "><h1 class="css-1dv1kvn">New York Times - Top Stories</h1><div data-hierarchy="feed" data-testid="programming-node"><div class="css-hmsvwu e1ppw5w20"><div class="css-m5ahyg"><div span="14" class="css-1l10c03 e17qa79g0"><div><div data-hierarchy="zone" data-testid="programming-node"><div class="css-1w1paqe e1ppw5w20"><div class="css-1u1zmuv e1ppw5w20"><div class="css-15rwwo"></div><div class="css-1lvvmm"><div span="14" class="css-1l10c03 e17qa79g0"><div class="css-hep49k e1yccyp20"><div class="css-1lvvmm"><div span="5" class="css-1432v6n e17qa79g0"><div class="css-hep49k e1yccyp20"><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" href="https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2025/06/02/world/europe/ukraine-russia-drone-attacks.html" data-uri="nyt://interactive/61cf716e-8ad4-5b98-b651-520da64b0b49" aria-hidden="false"><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-1gg6cw2">Ukraine Hid Attack Drones in Russia. These Videos Show What Happened Next.</p></div><p class="summary-class css-ofqxyv">Videos and satellite imagery illustrate how the attack unfolded and its aftermath.</p></a></section><section showed Ukraine’s ability to use relatively cheap drones to take out expensive aircraft and to strike sites far from its borders.</p><div class="css-1tic89u"><div><p class="css-1a0ymrn" data-ttr="1">5 data-uri="nyt://article/91801e6e-0b29-5270-a255-29270274607f" aria-hidden="false"><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-91bpc3">Elon Musk Returns to His Tech Empire, Plagued by Questions of Inattention</p></div><p class="summary-class css-1l5zmz6">As Mr. Musk steps away from Washington, he faces concerns over his prolonged absence from his businesses, including Tesla, SpaceX, xAI and X.</p><div class="css-1tic89u"><div><p class="css-1a0ymrn" data-ttr="1">6 min read</p></div></div></a></section><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-91bpc3">F.T.C. Investigates Ad Groups and Watchdogs, Alleging Boycott Collusion</p></div><p class="summary-class css-1l5zmz6">The  Federal Trade Commission is looking into whether roughly a dozen groups violated antitrust law by coordinating boycotts among advertisers.</p><div class="css-1tic89u"><div><p class="css-1a0ymrn" data-ttr="1">2 min read</p></div></div></a></section><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2025/06/02/technology/google-antitrust-breakup.html" data-uri="nyt://article/5e11d704-c795-5f69-b643-88a1ea7fac93" aria-hidden="false"><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-1a5fuvt">What if Google Just Broke Itself Up?
